Storages

The Storages class contains methods and properties related to the Kirikiri core storage system. You cannot create objects from this class.

Members

Constructor
None
Methods
addAutoPath ( Add to auto-search path )
chopStorageExt ( Remove storage name extension )
extractStorageExt ( Extract storage name extension )
extractStorageName ( Extract storage name )
extractStoragePath ( Extract storage name path )
getFullPath ( Get full unified storage name )
getLocalName ( Get local file name )
getPlacedPath ( Search for storage )
isExistentStorage ( Check for storage existence )
removeAutoPath ( Remove auto-search path )
searchCD ( Search for CD )
selectFile ( Display file selection dialog box )
Properties
None
Events
None
